title: tomcc : 正在提高游戏性能
author: 呆瓜Domado
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2641324669 于 2016-3-16 21:21 编辑 

Tommaso Checchi @_tomcc
Also: adding more code to improve performance of old code is more or less always a bad idea.


还有：添加更多代码让一些旧代码运行速度变快或多或少是个坏主意...

[PS]
*这也许暗示了他们正在优化游戏运行速度

replies.author: fgdg21234d
replies.txt_content:
